org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.as.decorators

Class SymbolDecoratorProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.as.decorators.SymbolDecoratorProvider

  • public class SymbolDecoratorProvider
extends Object
    This provider provides a way to decorate symbols with additional information, based on various conditions
